page.title: 12Jobs in our Area
page.content: {54%}of the{adult population}is{male and{46% female.}About{34%}of males and {15%}of females are employed full-time. {9%}of females work part-time.{15%}of males and{3%}of females are self- employed.{17%}of females are not seeking employment.Only 7 people are unemployed.The kinds of jobs that people do can be classified as:_ Construction-{11%}male,{3%}female Manufacturing-{13%}male,{9%}female Agriculture,forestry,mining,quarrying- {15%}male,{6%}female Communication distributive-{14%}male Business-{31%}male,{17%}female Catering/private domestic-{11%}female Local/nat.govt.services-{11%}female. Other male jobs-{4%. The type of work that people do within these areas is manual,clerical, professional/scientific and managerial
